mapper.insert: INSERT INTO friendRequest(user_id, friend_id, status, alarmId) VALUES (#{fromUser}, #{toUser}, #{status}, #{alarmId})
mapper.select: SELECT a.toUser, a.createAt, a.id, a.type, a.createAt, fr.alarmId AS friendRequestId, fr.user_id AS userId, fr.friend_id AS friendId, fr.status, usr.id as usrId, usr.display_name FROM alarm a LEFT JOIN friendRequest fr ON a.id = fr.alarmId LEFT JOIN users usr ON fr.user_id = usr.id WHERE a.toUser = #{userId} AND (a.type = 'friendRequest' OR fr.alarmId IS NULL)
